Tides explained with simulations

Simulating why there are 2 tidal bulges. The differential gravity causes what seems to be to bulges of water on both sides of the earth. Why? A better explanation is to see these bulges as vector forces. In this video i explain why. I'm also explaining why there aren't tides in lakes. All showed with simulations showing newtons gravitational equation. It all depends on the distance squared.
